name: Don't Take My Candy!!
description:
Just in time for Halloween! A Super Spooky Multiplayer VR experience, Don't Take My Candy!!  Help the kiddos on your team reconnect with their friends that are handing out candy around town. Zombies are infesting our little town, who could’ve known that building a town on an active graveyard site would cause an apocalypse!  Clear the streets of zombies that are looking for candy (it’s been awhile since they had a sweet treat), so the kiddos can continue their trick or treating. You will gain points for every candy the kiddos on your team get, also if you see candy on the ground make sure to pick it up before the zombies get it. They might be slow but they are hungry! You also gain points for clearing the streets of the candy stealing zombies. Compete in the Global High Score Competition.!! Thank you and Don’t take My Candy!!

If you want access to Meta Avatars, I have to add you as a tester to the Official Oculus App. Leave a comment below!! Thanks again, NeckBeard OUT!
